hints.content:
The first set of blocks shows $\blueE4$ tens and $\blueE3$ ones. 

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/0ce2c8b0169ff153dcc509f35ce499b051bf7f08)

There are $\blueE{43}$ blocks.

The second set of blocks shows $\maroonD0$ tens and $\maroonD{8}$ ones. 

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/3625ec2856cd0c23f1b6ed4f2781707da3ffcd7a)

So, we are subtracting $\maroonD{8}$ blocks.

When we subtract $\blueE{43}-\maroonD{8}$, the difference is $\blueE{35}$ blocks.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/3fcc1dc46c07b5f76ea1ae606f1d30914024c5e0)

This equation represents the place value blocks:

$43 - 8 = 35$

question.content:
**Which equation can be represented from the place value blocks below?**

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/f73f1c2d4d979140764c3bc77dca6602b25a922b)

[[☃ radio 1]]
